overview:
Bryan is an entrepreneur, investor and business adviser with a strong operations background coupled with 13 years of start up, new media, real estate, early stage financing, marketing, technology development and sales experience.

As President and Founder of Nerdy Cow, Bryan focuses on taking established businesses to new heights through multi-channel initiatives while at the same time helping the next generation of great entrepreneurs build better lasting businesses through proper Marketing, Development, Sales and Business Consulting.

Bryan’s passion for the implementation of emerging technology and his drive to help businesses from seed through growth stages is reflected in his successful track record of strategic development and execution of both web-based and brick and mortar businesses.
